questions: One question that covers the whole content is: How can tenant creation be automated?
Some optional questions that cover only part of the text could be:
- What is the method to automate tenant creation using API calls?
- How can a form trigger an API call for tenant creation?
- How can Tracardi workflows and events be used to automate tenant creation?
answer:
# How to Automate Tenant Creation
Tenant creation can be automated by making API calls to the tenant management service. You can create a form that, when
filled out, triggers an API call to your service. This, in turn, communicates with the tenant management service API to
create the new tenant. This can also be automated using Tracardi workflows and events.
